0.text: Innate: Olaf gains 0% − 75% (based on missing health)  bonus attack speed.
Active: Olaf throws an axe to the target location, dealing physical damage to all enemies it passes through and  slowing them for 1.5 − 2.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds.

1.text: Olaf grants  ghosting to  monsters hit for 6 seconds.

2.text: The axe impacts at the target location, briefly grants  sight of its immediate surroundings and remains there for a duration equal to the  cooldown. Olaf reduces the cooldown of Undertow by 4.5 seconds upon retrieving the axe by walking within pickup distance of it.

0.text: Active: Olaf empowers his axes for 6 seconds, gaining  bonus attack speed, bonus  life steal, and 0% − 33% (based on missing health) increased  healing from all sources for the duration.

1.text: Life steal and  spell vamp bonuses are calculated on-cast and remain static for the full duration.

0.text: Active: Olaf strikes thunder onto the target enemy, dealing them  true damage.

1.text: Reckless Swing  heals Olaf for  its health cost if it kills its target and its  cooldown is reduced by 1 second every time Olaf lands a basic attack.

0.text: Passive: Olaf gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance while Ragnarok is inactive.

1.text: Active: Olaf becomes enraged for 6 seconds, initially  cleansing himself of all  crowd control and becoming  immune to crowd control and gaining  bonus attack damage as well as 10% increased size for the duration. For the first second of Ragnarok, he also gains  bonus movement speed towards  visible enemy  champions within 2000 units.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Chilling Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Chilling Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

Keywords

  • jungle

active.originText: UNIQUE – THIRSTING SLASH: Deal 100% AD physical damage to enemies in a  450 radius around you.  Heal for 25% AD (+ 10% of your missing health) for each enemy champion hit (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+50 attack damage
+400 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Bloodlust: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for ( 2% / 1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% / 3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, you first gain a shield that absorbs 100 damage for 4 seconds, increased by ( 8% / 4.8%) maximum health per stack of Bloodlust, up to an increase of ( 40% / 24%) maximum health at 5 Bloodlust stacks (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – BLOODLUST: After dealing damage to or taking damage from an enemy champion,  heal for ( 2% /  1.2%) of maximum health over 6 seconds. This stacks and refreshes per unique champion, up to 5 times, but every stack beyond the first is reduced by 50%, for a maximum of healing for ( 6% /  3.6%) of maximum health over the duration.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 35% / 15%) of all post-mitigation physical damage received, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: Champion takedowns remove Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heal you for 15% of your maximum health over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 35% /  15%) of all post-mitigation physical damage received, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
